source: Model is the state of your application. It tells you what your application looks like at any point in time.

description: A way to turn your state into HTML
source: View is a way to turn your state into HTML. It describes what your application looks like at any point in time.

description: A way to update your state based on messages
source: Update is a way to update your state based on messages. It describes how your state changes in response to messages.

description: A function that always returns the same output given the same input
source: Pure Function is a function that always returns the same output given the same input. It describes how your state changes in response to messages.

description: A function that does something other than return a value
source: Side Effect is a function that does something other than return a value. It describes how your state changes in response to messages.

description: A description of a state change
source: Message is a description of a state change. It describes how your state changes in response to messages.
State is the state of your application. It tells you what your application looks like at any point in time.

description: A way to turn your state into HTML
source: HTML is a way to turn your state into HTML. It describes what your application looks like at any point in time.

source: CSS is a way to update your state based on messages. It describes how your state changes in response to messages.

description: A function that always returns the same output given the same input
